mapper.insert: insert into `tb_strategy_follow`( member_id, service_id, strategy_time, input_amount, win_amount, profit_amount, follow_time ) values( #{member_id}, #{service_id}, #{strategy_time}, #{input_amount}, #{win_amount}, #{profit_amount}, #{follow_time} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `tb_strategy_follow` ORDER BY id
SELECT SUM(input_amount) FROM `tb_strategy_follow` ORDER BY id
SELECT SUM(win_amount) FROM `tb_strategy_follow` ORDER BY id
SELECT SUM(profit_amount) FROM `tb_strategy_follow` ORDER BY id
